ProteinName	Cyclic AMP-dependent transcription factor ATF-6 beta (cAMP-dependent transcription factor ATF-6 beta) (Activating transcription factor 6 beta) (ATF6-beta) (Protein G13) (cAMP response element-binding protein-related protein) (Creb-rp) (cAMP-responsive element-binding protein-like 1) [Cleaved into: Processed cyclic AMP-dependent transcription factor ATF-6 beta]

Function	Precursor of the transcription factor form (Processed cyclic AMP-dependent transcription factor ATF-6 beta), which is embedded in the endoplasmic reticulum membrane (PubMed:11256944). Endoplasmic reticulum stress promotes processing of this form, releasing the transcription factor form that translocates into the nucleus, where it activates transcription of genes involved in the unfolded protein response (UPR) (PubMed:11256944).
Subcellular Location	Endoplasmic reticulum membrane; Nucleus
